name: Find That One Game
description:
Find that One Game is a puzzle game where you find the odd one out.

Every picture has a duplicate except one - find that one.

Play casual or expert mode in 48 levels with 8 different designs and 254 pictures.

Casual Mode:

  • Unlimited mistakes;
  • 5 Hints allowed per level;
  • Earn gold by finding all 20 pictures without using a hint.

Expert Mode:

  • 5 Mistakes allowed;
  • 2 Hints allowed per level;
  • Earn gold by finding all 20 pictures without using a hint or making a mistake.

Switch between casual / expert mode at any time and continue from where you left off.

Replay any level to get gold.

 The image to find is randomly chosen and will be different every time you play or restart a level.

Please see my website for credits
